text: Ra na timra dhanasampatti ra nata timra santanaharu yasta chan jasale timila'i hamisita darjama nikata garidi'un. Ho, josukaile imana lya'e ra ramro karma gare ta yasta manisaharuko nimti tyasale gareko karmako du'iguna badala cha, ra uniharu mathillo tahaka kaksaharuma niscintatapurvaka rahanechan
